title: We can add the most value as practitioners by creating accessible and appropriate software within time scales which are relevant to users

story.text: The software we produce should always take accessibility into account.

We should strive to produce software which is at least minimally usable on a reasonable time scale. It should not take decades, like Hurd. Technology moves quickly and if it takes too long to create a first release then what you're releasing may no longer be relevant.
